Protecting script from freezes!")); } function heartbeat() { lastActivityTime = Date.now(); if (watchdog) { watchdog.postMessage('ping'); } } let reconnectAttempts = 0; const MAX_RECONNECT_DELAY = 23369; async function recoverAndRestart() { const INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY = 4369; if (isReconnecting) { return; } isReconnecting = true; try { console.log(chalk.bgYellow.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âš ï¸ RECOVERY INITIATED âš ï¸ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); if (activePairContract) { activePairContract.removeAllListeners(); console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Removed all listeners from pair contract.")); } if (heartbeatInterval) { clearInterval(heartbeatInterval); console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Cleared heartbeat interval.")); } if (logWalletBalanceInterval) { clearInterval(logWalletBalanceInterval); } isMonitoring = false; isBuyInProgress = false; isSellInProgress = false; const backoff = Math.min( INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY * Math.pow(1.5, reconnectAttempts), MAX_RECONNECT_DELAY ); reconnectAttempts++; console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Attempting to reconnect... (Attempt ${reconnectAttempts}))); console.log(chalk.yellow(â±ï¸ Waiting ${(backoff/1000).toFixed(1)} seconds before next attempt)); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, backoff)); try { console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Reinitializing providers...")); if (wsProvider && wsProvider._websocket) { wsProvider._websocket.close(); } wsProvider = new ethers.WebSocketProvider(activeNetwork.wsUrl); provider = await initializeProvider(); if (!provider) { throw new Error("Provider initialization failed"); } mevBlockerProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(activeNetwork.rpcUrl); console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Testing provider connections...")); await Promise.all([ wsProvider.getBlockNumber(), provider.getBlockNumber(), mevBlockerProvider.getBlockNumber() ]); reconnectAttempts = 0; console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Restarting heartbeat system...")); setupHeartbeat(); const pairCode = await provider.getCode(pairAddress); if (pairCode === "0x") { throw new Error("Pair contract not found"); } console.log(chalk.bgGreen.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âœ… ALL SYSTEMS REINITIALIZED âœ… â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸš€ Restarting monitoring... â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); if (initialTokenPrice) { console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Restored initial token price: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenPrice, 18)} ETH)); } if (initialTokenValueInWETH) { console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Restored initial token value: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18)} ETH)); } if (lastBuySuccessful) { console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ RESUMING PNL MONITORING ðŸš€ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ•’ Time: ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• â•‘ ðŸš€ ORIGINAL PROFIT STRATEGY RESTORED â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); heartbeat(); wallet = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.PRIVATE_KEY, provider); const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wallet); // Add retry logic for token balance let currentTokenBalance = null; let attempts = 0; const maxAttempts = 7; while (attempts < maxAttempts) { attempts++; try { currentTokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); if (currentTokenBalance && currentTokenBalance > 0n) { console.log(chalk.green(âœ… Fetched token balance: ${ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenBalance, await tokenContract.decimals())})); break; } else { console.log(chalk.yellow(âš ï¸ Attempt ${attempts}/${maxAttempts}: Token balance returned zero. Retrying...)); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 4369)); } } catch (error) { console.log(chalk.red(âŒ Attempt ${attempts}/${maxAttempts}: Error fetching balance: ${error.message})); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 4369)); } } if (!currentTokenBalance || currentTokenBalance === 0n) { console.log(chalk.red("ðŸš¨ Failed to get non-zero balance after max attempts. Restarting recovery.")); isReconnecting = false; setTimeout(recoverAndRestart, 1000); return; } console.log(chalk.bgCyan.green.bold("\nâœ… Contracts reinitialized!\n")); await logWalletBalance(tokenAddress, tokenContract, pairAddress); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const reserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const token0 = await pairContract.token0(); const isWETH0 = token0.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase(); const wethReserve = isWETH0 ? reserves[0] : reserves[1]; const tokenReserve = isWETH0 ? reserves[1] : reserves[0]; console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Preserved original token value: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18)} ETH)); console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Current token value should bee: ${ethers.formatUnits((BigInt(currentTokenBalance) * BigInt(wethReserve)) / BigInt(tokenReserve), 18)} ETH)); await monitorPNL(tokenAddress, pairAddress, currentTokenBalance); } else { console.log(chalk.bgCyan.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ RESUMING TRANSACTION MONITORING ðŸš€ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ•’ Time: ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• â•‘ ðŸš€ ORIGINAL TRADING STRATEGY RESTORED â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); heartbeat(); const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wsProvider); await logWalletBalance(tokenAddress, tokenContract, pairAddress); await monitorTransactions(tokenAddress, pairAddress); } } catch (error) { throw new Error(Provider reinitialization failed: ${error.message}); } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.bgRed.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âŒ ERROR DURING RECOVERY âŒ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸš¨ Error: ${error.message.substring(0, 40)}${error.message.length > 40 ? '...' : ''} â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ•’ Time: ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• )); const nextDelay = Math.min( INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY * Math.pow(1.5, reconnectAttempts), MAX_RECONNECT_DELAY ); console.log(chalk.yellow(â³ Connection still down. Next recovery attempt in ${(nextDelay/1000).toFixed(3)} seconds...)); setTimeout(recoverAndRestart, nextDelay); } finally { // Always reset reconnection flag when done, even if there was an error setTimeout(() => { isReconnecting = false; }, 4369); // Small delay to prevent immediate reconnection attempts } } async function initializeProvider() { try { provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(activeNetwork.rpcUrl); await provider.getBlockNumber(); console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Provider connected successfully!")); return provider; } catch (error) { if (!isReconnecting) { console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ Provider connection failed, waiting for internet to recover...")); } return null; } } let listenerCheckInterval = setInterval(checkAndRestartListeners, LISTENER_CHECK_INTERVAL); let isRestartingListeners = false; process.on("unhandledRejection", (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Unhandled Promise Rejection:", error)); recoverAndRestart().catch((err) => { console.error(chalk.red("Error during recovery:", err)); }); }); process.on("uncaughtException", (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Uncaught Exception:", error)); }); function setupHeartbeat() { if (heartbeatInterval) { clearInterval(heartbeatInterval); } lastHeartbeatTime = Date.now(); heartbeatInterval = setInterval(async () => { try { if (!provider?._websocket?.readyState === WebSocket.OPEN) { throw new Error("WebSocket connection not open"); } const blockNumber = await provider.getBlockNumber(); if (!blockNumber) { throw new Error("Invalid block number received"); } console.log(chalk.bgBlack.green.bold(âœ… WebSocket connection healthy at ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} - Block:, blockNumber)); lastHeartbeatTime = Date.now(); // Update timestamp on successful check } catch (error) { console.warn(chalk.yellow("\nHeartbeat check failed:", error.message)); const timeSinceLastHeartbeat = Date.now() - lastHeartbeatTime; if (timeSinceLastHeartbeat > HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL && !isReconnecting) { console.warn(chalk.yellow(No heartbeat for ${Math.floor(timeSinceLastHeartbeat / 1000)} seconds. Initiating reconnection...)); // Force reset isReconnecting flag after 60 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (isReconnecting) { console.log(chalk.red("Force resetting reconnection flag after timeout")); isReconnecting = false; } }, 60000); recoverAndRestart(); } } }, HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL); } async function checkAndRestartListeners() { if (isRestartingListeners || !activePairContract) return; try { isRestartingListeners = true; const currentListeners = activePairContract.listenerCount("Swap"); if (currentListeners === 0 && isMonitoring && !lastBuySuccessful) { console.log(chalk.yellow("ðŸ”„ No active listeners detected. Restarting monitoring...")); activePairContract.removeAllListeners(); isMonitoring = false; await monitorTransactions(tokenAddress, pairAddress); } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("Error checking listeners:", error)); await recoverAndRestart(); } finally { isRestartingListeners = false; } } process.on("unhandledRejection", (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Unhandled Promise Rejection:", error)); recoverAndRestart().catch((err) => { console.error(chalk.red("Error during recovery:", err)); }); }); process.on("uncaughtException", (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Uncaught Exception:", error)); }); async function sendMEVProtectedTx(tx, provider) { let sentTx, receipt; console.log(chalk.bgCyan.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ TRANSACTION SUBMITTED ðŸš€ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£)); try { sentTx = await wallet.sendTransaction(tx); receipt = await sentTx.wait(); console.log(chalk.bgCyan.black.bold( â•‘To: ${tx.to}â•‘ â•‘ Gas Limit: ${tx.gasLimit.toString()} â•‘ â•‘ Max Fee: ${ethers.formatUnits(tx.maxFeePerGas, 'gwei')} gwei â•‘ â•‘ Priority Fee: ${ethers.formatUnits(tx.maxPriorityFeePerGas, 'gwei')} gwei â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); if (!receipt || receipt.status !== 1) { throw new Error("Transaction failed"); } return receipt; } catch (error) { if (sentTx?.hash) { try { const txStatus = await provider.getTransaction(sentTx.hash); if (txStatus?.blockNumber) { receipt = await txStatus.wait(); if (receipt && receipt.status === 1) { return receipt; } } } catch (e) {} } throw error; } } async function testMEVBlockerConnection() { try { const mevBlockerProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(activeNetwork.rpcUrl); const blockNumber = await mevBlockerProvider.getBlockNumber(); console.log(chalk.bgGreen.green.bold("\nâœ… MEV Blocker connection successful!\n")); console.log(chalk.bgCyan.cyan.bold(Current block number: ${blockNumber})); } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("\nâŒ Failed to connect to MEV Blocker:", error.message)); process.exit(1); } } const routerABI = [ "function getAmountsOut(uint amountIn, address[] memory path) public view returns (uint[] memory)", "function AuthenticallyBasedSwap(uint amountIn, uint amountOutMin, address[] calldata path, address to, uint deadline) external payable", "function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(uint amountIn, uint amountOutMin, address[] calldata path, address to, uint deadline) external", "function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(uint amountIn, uint amountOutMin, address[] calldata path, address to, uint deadline) external", ]; const tokenABI = [ "event Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value)", "function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) external returns (bool)", "function allowance(address owner, address spender) external view returns (uint256)", "function decimals() external view returns (uint8)", "function balanceOf(address account) external view returns (uint256)", "function name() external view returns (string)", "function symbol() external view returns (string)", "function totalSupply() external view returns (uint256)", ]; const pairABI = [ "function getReserves() external view returns (uint112 reserve0, uint112 reserve1, uint32 blockTimestampLast)", "function token0() external view returns (address)", "function token1() external view returns (address)", "event Swap(address indexed sender, uint amount0In, uint amount1In, uint amount0Out, uint amount1Out, address indexed to)" ]; function getSwapFunction(isSelling = false) { if (isSelling) { return "swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens"; } if (activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base) { return "AuthenticallyBasedSwap"; } else if (activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum) { return "AuthenticallyBasedSwap"; } else { throw new Error("Unsupported network!"); } } async function checkIfToken0IsWETH(pairAddress) { const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const token0 = await pairContract.token0(); return token0.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase(); } async function monitorTransactions(tokenAddress, pairAddress) { if (isMonitoring) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Already monitoring transactions. Skipping duplicate monitoring.")); return; } isMonitoring = true; if (lastBuySuccessful) { console.log("â„¹ï¸ Monitoring is already paused or active due to a successful buy."); return; } const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wsProvider); const routerContract = new ethers.Contract(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, routerABI, wsProvider); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const symbol = await tokenContract.symbol(); const decimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.yellowBright.bold("\nðŸ” Checking WETH approval status...")); const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, tokenABI, wallet); const wethAllowance = await wethContract.allowance(wallet.address, AuthenticallyCryptoRouter); if (wethAllowance < ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18)) { console.log(chalk.yellow.bold("\nApproving router to spend WETH...")); const approveTx = await wethContract.approve(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, ethers.MaxUint256); await approveTx.wait(); console.log(chalk.bgGreen.bold("\nWETH SUCCESSFULLY APPROVED!")); } else { console.log(chalk.bgGreen.greenBright.bold("\nWETH ALREADY APPROVED! \nYour AutoBuy using WETH will work flawlessly! ðŸš€\n")); } const [initialReserves] = await Promise.all([pairContract.getReserves()]); const token0 = await pairContract.token0(); const isWETH0 = token0.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase(); global_isWETH0 = isWETH0; const initialWethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? initialReserves[0] : initialReserves[1]; const initialTokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? initialReserves[1] : initialReserves[0]; const swapFunction = getSwapFunction(); if (!initialTokenPrice) { initialTokenPrice = (BigInt(initialWethReserve) * BigInt(ethers.WeiPerEther)) / BigInt(initialTokenReserve); console.log(chalk.yellow(ðŸ”„ Saved initial token price: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenPrice, 18)} ETH)); } console.log(chalk.bgBlack.cyan.bold(\nðŸ”ðŸš€ ***Monitoring Transactions to Buy ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH worth of ${symbol} \nAfter Price Drop of ${PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD}% ðŸš€ðŸ” ðŸ’Ž ðŸŒ•âœ¨)); console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.black.bold("\nðŸ’–ðŸ’–ðŸ’– Hey there! ðŸ’–ðŸ’–ðŸ’–")); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.magentaBright.bold("âœ¨ If this bot is rocking your world... âœ¨")); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.magentaBright.bold("\nðŸŒ Leave a comment in: Telegram ðŸ’¡")); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.magentaBright.bold("ðŸ’Œ Your feedback keeps me making awesome things happen! ðŸš€\n")); const wethBalance = await wethContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); if (wethBalance < ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18)) { console.log(chalk.redBright.bold("\nâŒ NOT ENOUGH ðŸ’¸WETHðŸ’¸ BALANCE IN YOUR WALLET TO PERFORM THIS TRADE âŒ\n\n")); console.log(chalk.redBright.bold(\nðŸ’¸ Have: ${ethers.formatEther(wethBalance)} WETH, Need: ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH\n)); console.log(chalk.bgRed.white.bold("Exiting bot due to insufficient WETH balance...")); process.exit(1); } const swapListener = async (sender, amount0In, amount1In, amount0Out, amount1Out, to, event) => { try { if (lastBuySuccessful) return; const isToken0WETH = await checkIfToken0IsWETH(pairAddress); let tokenAmountIn, tokenAmountOut, wethAmountIn, wethAmountOut; if (isToken0WETH) { tokenAmountIn = amount1In; tokenAmountOut = amount1Out; wethAmountIn = amount0In; wethAmountOut = amount0Out; } else { tokenAmountIn = amount0In; tokenAmountOut = amount0Out; wethAmountIn = amount1In; wethAmountOut = amount1Out; } const isBuy = tokenAmountOut > 0n; const isSell = tokenAmountIn > 0n; if (isBuy || isSell) { const tokenValueFormatted = Number(ethers.formatUnits( isBuy ? tokenAmountOut : tokenAmountIn, decimals )); const wethValueFormatted = Number(ethers.formatUnits( isBuy ? wethAmountIn : wethAmountOut, 18 )); const ethUsdPrice = await getETHUSDPrice(); const ethValue = wethValueFormatted; const usdValue = ethValue * ethUsdPrice; const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); if (isBuy) { console.log(chalk.bgGreen.black.bold([${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}] ðŸŸ¢ BUY DETECTED)); console.log(chalk.green.bold( ðŸ’¸ Tokens Bought: ${tokenValueFormatted.toFixed(3)} ${symbol})); console.log(chalk.green.bold( ðŸ’° ETH Spent: ${ethValue.toFixed(4)} ETH)); console.log(chalk.green.bold( ðŸ’µ USD Value: ${usdValue.toFixed(2)} USD)); } else { console.log(chalk.bgRed.black.bold([${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}] ðŸ”´ SELL DETECTED)); console.log(chalk.red.bold( ðŸ’¸ Tokens Sold: ${tokenValueFormatted.toFixed(3)} ${symbol})); console.log(chalk.red.bold( ðŸ’° ETH Received: ${ethValue.toFixed(4)} ETH)); console.log(chalk.red.bold( ðŸ’µ USD Value: ${usdValue.toFixed(2)} USD)); } } listenerCheckInterval = setInterval(checkAndRestartListeners, LISTENER_CHECK_INTERVAL); const [reserves] = await Promise.all([pairContract.getReserves()]); const wethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[0] : reserves[1]; const tokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[1] : reserves[0]; currentTokenPrice = (BigInt(wethReserve) * BigInt(ethers.WeiPerEther)) / BigInt(tokenReserve); const scaleFactor = 10000n; // Fixed formula const priceImpactPercentageBN = ((initialTokenPrice - currentTokenPrice) * scaleFactor * 100n) / initialTokenPrice; const priceImpactPercentage = Number(priceImpactPercentageBN) / Number(scaleFactor); const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); const currentTime = Date.now(); if (currentTime - lastPriceUpdateTime >= PRICE_UPDATE_INTERVAL) { lastPriceUpdateTime = currentTime; const priceChangeColor = priceImpactPercentage > 0 ? chalk.bgRed.red : chalk.bgGreen.green; const formattedPriceChange = priceChangeColor((priceImpactPercentage > 0 ? "-" : "+") + Math.abs(priceImpactPercentage).toFixed(2) + "%"); console.log(chalk.bgCyan.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸ“Š PRICE UPDATE ðŸ“Š â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ“Š Price Change: ${formattedPriceChange} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸŽ¯ Target Decrease: -${chalk.yellow(${PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD}%)} â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ”» Stop Loss Trigger: ${chalk.red(${STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE}%)} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•\n)); } if (priceImpactPercentage >= PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD) { if (isBuyInProgress) { return; } const now = Date.now(); if (now - lastBuyTimestamp < 4369) { return; } lastBuyTimestamp = now; try { console.log(chalk.bgGreenBright.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸŽ¯ PRICE DROP THRESHOLD REACHED! ðŸŽ¯ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ Target: ${PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD}% | Current: ${priceImpactPercentage.toFixed(2)}% â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸš€ INITIATING AUTO-BUY SEQUENCE ðŸš€ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); console.log(chalk.yellow("\nðŸ›¡ï¸ Verifying price movement to avoid Trickery...")); isBuyInProgress = true; const [newReserves] = await Promise.all([pairContract.getReserves()]); const newWethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? newReserves[0] : newReserves[1]; const newTokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? newReserves[1] : newReserves[0]; const newTokenPrice = (BigInt(newWethReserve) * BigInt(ethers.WeiPerEther)) / BigInt(newTokenReserve); const newPriceImpactPercentageBN = ((initialTokenPrice - newTokenPrice) * scaleFactor * 100n) / initialTokenPrice; const newPriceImpactPercentage = Number(newPriceImpactPercentageBN) / Number(scaleFactor); if (newPriceImpactPercentage < PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD) { console.log(chalk.red("âš ï¸ MEV protection: Price didn't maintain threshold - resetting")); isBuyInProgress = false; return; } console.log(chalk.bgGreen.green.bold("\nâœ… Price verified - continuing...\n")); isBuyInProgress = true; pairContract.removeAllListeners("Swap"); let isProcessingTransaction = false; if (isProcessingTransaction) { console.log("Already processing a transaction..."); return; } isProcessingTransaction = true; const aggressiveBaseFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "36.9", "gwei"); const aggressivePriorityFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "3.69", "gwei"); console.log(chalk.yellow("Preparing buy transaction with parameters:")); console.log(chalk.green(Input Amount: ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH)); console.log(chalk.yellow(From Token: ${WETH_ADDRESS})); console.log(chalk.yellowBright(To Token: ${tokenAddress})); const amountsOut = await routerContract.getAmountsOut(ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18), [WETH_ADDRESS, tokenAddress]); const amountOutMin = amountsOut[1] * 94n / 100n; const timestamp = BigInt(Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)); const deadline = timestamp + 23n; const buyTx = { to: AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, data: routerContract.interface.encodeFunctionData( swapFunction, [ ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18), amountOutMin, [WETH_ADDRESS, tokenAddress], wallet.address, deadline ] ), value: 0n, gasLimit: 923369n, maxFeePerGas: aggressiveBaseFee + aggressivePriorityFee, maxPriorityFeePerGas: aggressivePriorityFee, type: 2, chainId: activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 1 : 8453 }; const routerCode = await provider.getCode(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter); if (routerCode === "0x") { throw new Error("Router contract not found!"); } const receipt = await sendMEVProtectedTx(buyTx, provider); if (receipt && receipt.status === 1) { console.log(chalk.bgGreen.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ BUY TRANSACTION SUCCESSFUL! ðŸš€ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ${chalk.green('âœ¨ Transaction Details:')} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ”¢ Gas Used:')} ${receipt.gasUsed.toString()} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ·ï¸ Symbol:')} ${symbol} â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ’° Amount Purchased:')} ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.magenta('ðŸ“Š PNL Monitoring Activated')} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); console.log(chalk.bgBlue.blueBright.underline(\nView on Etherscan: ${ETHERSCAN_BASE_URL}${receipt.hash})); lastBuySuccessful = true; await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 123)); const updatedTokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const reserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const wethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[0] : reserves[1]; const tokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[1] : reserves[0]; initialTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(updatedTokenBalance) * BigInt(wethReserve)) / BigInt(tokenReserve); console.log(chalk.yellow(\nðŸ’¾ Stored initial token value: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18)} ETH)); await monitorPNL(tokenAddress, pairAddress, updatedTokenBalance); isProcessingTransaction = false; return; } } catch (error) { console.error("âŒ Buy attempt failed:", error.message); if (error.code) { console.error("Error code:", error.code); } } finally { isBuyInProgress = false; isSellInProgress = false; } } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Error in swap listener:", error.message)); } }; if (PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD === 0) { console.log(chalk.bgGreen.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ BUY NOW ENABLED! ðŸš€ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ Initiating immediate buy... â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); await initiateBuy(); } else { try { activePairContract = pairContract; pairContract.on("Swap", swapListener) .catch(async (error) => { console.error("âŒ Error setting up swap listener:", error); isMonitoring = false; await recoverAndRestart(); }); provider.on("error", async (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Provider error:"), error); try { await recoverAndRestart(); } catch (reconnectError) { console.error(chalk.red("Failed to reconnect:"), reconnectError); process.exit(1); } }); } catch (error) { console.error("Error in monitorTransactions:", error); isMonitoring = false; await recoverAndRestart(); } } } async function initiateBuy() { if (isBuyInProgress) { return; } const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, provider); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, provider); const token0 = await pairContract.token0(); global_isWETH0 = token0.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase(); console.log("Initialized global_isWETH0:", global_isWETH0); const shouldProceed = await checkLiquidityAndBuy(tokenAddress, pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, tokenContract); if (!shouldProceed) { return; } const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, tokenABI, wallet); const wethBalance = await wethContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const swapFunction = getSwapFunction(); if (wethBalance < ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18)) { console.log(chalk.redBright.bold("\nâŒ NOT ENOUGH ðŸ’¸WETHðŸ’¸ BALANCE IN YOUR WALLET TO PERFORM THIS TRADE âŒ\n\n")); throw new Error(\nInsufficient WETH balance. Have: ${ethers.formatEther(wethBalance)} WETH, Need: ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH); } const now = Date.now(); if (now - lastBuyTimestamp < 4369) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Buy already in progress...")); return; } lastBuyTimestamp = now; isBuyInProgress = true; try { const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wsProvider); const routerContract = new ethers.Contract(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, routerABI, wsProvider); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const symbol = await tokenContract.symbol(); const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, tokenABI, wallet); const wethAllowance = await wethContract.allowance(wallet.address, AuthenticallyCryptoRouter); if (wethAllowance < ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18)) { console.log(chalk.yellow.bold("\nApproving router to spend WETH...")); const approveTx = await wethContract.approve(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, ethers.MaxUint256); await approveTx.wait(); console.log(chalk.bgGreen.bold("\nWETH SUCCESSFULLY APPROVED!")); } const aggressiveBaseFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "36.9", "gwei"); const aggressivePriorityFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "7.69", "gwei"); console.log(chalk.bgYellow.yellow.bold("Preparing buy transaction with parameters:")); console.log(chalk.green(Input Amount: ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH)); console.log(chalk.yellow(From Token: ${WETH_ADDRESS})); console.log(chalk.yellowBright(To Token: ${tokenAddress})); const amountsOut = await routerContract.getAmountsOut( ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18), [WETH_ADDRESS, tokenAddress] ); const amountOutMin = amountsOut[1] * 94n / 100n; // 6% slippage const timestamp = BigInt(Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)); const deadline = timestamp + 23n; const buyTx = { to: AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, data: routerContract.interface.encodeFunctionData( swapFunction, [ ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18), amountOutMin, [WETH_ADDRESS, tokenAddress], wallet.address, deadline ] ), value: 0n, gasLimit: 923369n, maxFeePerGas: aggressiveBaseFee + aggressivePriorityFee, maxPriorityFeePerGas: aggressivePriorityFee, type: 2, chainId: activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 1 : 8453 }; console.log(chalk.yellow(\nðŸš€ Submitting BUY NOW transaction...)); const receipt = await sendMEVProtectedTx(buyTx, provider); if (receipt && receipt.status === 1) { console.log(chalk.bgGreen.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš€ BUY TRANSACTION SUCCESSFUL! ðŸš€ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ${chalk.green('âœ¨ Transaction Details:')} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ”¢ Gas Used:')} ${receipt.gasUsed.toString()} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ·ï¸ Symbol:')} ${symbol} â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.yellow('ðŸ’° Amount Purchased:')} ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} WETH â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.magenta('ðŸŽ¯ Next Steps:')} â•‘ â•‘ ${chalk.cyan('ðŸ“Š PNL Monitoring Activated')} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); console.log(chalk.bgBlue.blueBright.underline(\nView on Etherscan: ${ETHERSCAN_BASE_URL}${receipt.hash})); lastBuySuccessful = true; if (pairContract.listenerCount("Swap") > 0) { pairContract.removeAllListeners("Swap"); } console.log(chalk.yellow("â³ Waiting for blockchain to update balance...")); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2369)); const updatedTokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const reserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const wethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[0] : reserves[1]; const tokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? reserves[1] : reserves[0]; initialTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(updatedTokenBalance) * BigInt(wethReserve)) / BigInt(tokenReserve); console.log(chalk.yellow(\nðŸ’¾ Stored initial token value: ${ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18)} ETH)); if (!initialTokenValueInWETH) { console.log(chalk.red("âŒ Error: initialTokenValueInWETH is null or undefined. Retrying calculation...")); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 923)); initialTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(updatedTokenBalance) * BigInt(wethReserve)) / BigInt(tokenReserve); if (!initialTokenValueInWETH) { console.log(chalk.red("âŒ Error: Failed to calculate initialTokenValueInWETH again. Using fallback...")); initialTokenValueInWETH = ethers.parseUnits(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toString(), 18); } } await monitorPNL(tokenAddress, pairAddress, updatedTokenBalance); } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Buy attempt failed:", error)); if (error.code) { console.error(chalk.red("Error code:", error.code)); } } finally { isBuyInProgress = false; } } function setupPnlListenerCheck() { if (pnlListenerCheckInterval) { clearInterval(pnlListenerCheckInterval); } pnlListenerCheckInterval = setInterval(() => { if (lastBuySuccessful && pairAddress && activePairContract) { const listenerCount = activePairContract.listenerCount("Swap"); console.log(chalk.cyan(PNL Monitoring Check: ${listenerCount} Swap listeners active)); if (listenerCount === 0) { console.log(chalk.bgRed.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš¨ PNL MONITORING STOPPED! ðŸš¨ â•‘ â•‘ No active Swap listeners detected â•‘ â•‘ Recovering monitoring... â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); recoverAndRestart(); } } }, 292369); } async function monitorPNL(tokenAddress, pairAddress, providedTokenBalance = null) { const lastRecordedTokenBalance = providedTokenBalance; const scaleFactor = 10000n; setupPnlListenerCheck(); try { const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wallet); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const decimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); provider.on("error", async (error) => { console.error(chalk.red("Provider error during PNL monitoring:"), error); await recoverAndRestart(); }); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.yellow("\nðŸ” Checking token approval status...\n")); const currentAllowance = await tokenContract.allowance(wallet.address, AuthenticallyCryptoRouter); if (currentAllowance < ethers.MaxUint256 / 2n) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš¡ Approving tokens for future sell...")); const approveTx = await tokenContract.approve(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, ethers.MaxUint256); await approveTx.wait(); console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Tokens approved! Ready for instant selling when target reached.")); } else { console.log(chalk.bgBlack.green("âœ… Tokens already approved! Ready for instant selling.")); } console.log(chalk.bgYellow.black.bold("\nðŸ’° Monitoring PNL -- REAL TIME Profits or Losses...")); const symbol = await tokenContract.symbol(); let isFirstRun = true; pairContract.on("Swap", async (_sender, _amount0In, _amount1In, _amount0Out, _amount1Out, _to, _event) => { try { const updatedReserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const updatedWethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[0] : updatedReserves[1]; const updatedTokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[1] : updatedReserves[0]; if (updatedTokenReserve === 0n || updatedWethReserve === 0n) { console.log(chalk.red("âŒ Error: Zero reserves detected, skipping PNL calculation.")); return; } const currentTokenBalance = (isFirstRun && providedTokenBalance != null) ? providedTokenBalance : lastRecordedTokenBalance; const currentTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(currentTokenBalance) * BigInt(updatedWethReserve)) / BigInt(updatedTokenReserve); const pnlPercentageBN = ((BigInt(currentTokenValueInWETH) - BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH)) * scaleFactor * 100n) / BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH); const pnlPercentage = Number(pnlPercentageBN) / Number(scaleFactor); const ethUSDPrice = await getETHUSDPrice(); const pnlUSD = (Number(ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenValueInWETH, 18)) - Number(ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18))) * ethUSDPrice; if (isFirstRun) { console.log(chalk.bgBlack.cyan.bold("\nðŸ” Current Values:")); console.log(chalk.cyan("Token Balance:", ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenBalance, decimals))); console.log(chalk.cyan("WETH Reserve:", ethers.formatUnits(updatedWethReserve, 18))); console.log(chalk.cyan("Token Reserve:", ethers.formatUnits(updatedTokenReserve, decimals))); console.log(chalk.cyan("Current Position Value:", ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenValueInWETH, 18))); console.log(chalk.cyan("Initial Total Position Value:", ethers.formatUnits(initialTokenValueInWETH, 18))); console.log(chalk.cyan("ETH-USD Price:", ethUSDPrice)); console.log(chalk.cyan("PNL Percentage:", pnlPercentage.toFixed(2))); console.log(chalk.cyan("PNL in USD:", pnlUSD.toFixed(2))); isFirstRun = false; } const isBuy = global_isWETH0 ? (_amount0In > 0n && _amount1Out > 0n) : (_amount1In > 0n && _amount0Out > 0n); const isSell = global_isWETH0 ? (_amount1In > 0n && _amount0Out > 0n) : (_amount0In > 0n && _amount1Out > 0n); const ethValue = global_isWETH0 ? Number(ethers.formatUnits(isBuy ? _amount0In : _amount0Out, 18)) : Number(ethers.formatUnits(isBuy ? _amount1In : _amount1Out, 18)); const transactionType = isBuy ? chalk.bgGreen.green.bold(BUY (${parseFloat(ethValue).toFixed(4)})) : isSell ? chalk.bgRed.red.bold(SELL (${parseFloat(ethValue).toFixed(4)})) : chalk.yellow.bold("UNKNOWN"); console.log(chalk.bgCyan.black.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸ’° PNL UPDATE ðŸ’° â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ“Š Current/Target PNL: ${pnlPercentage.toFixed(2)} % / ${PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE}% â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ“‰ Stop Loss: ${-STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE}% â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ’µ USD Value: $${pnlUSD.toFixed(2)} â•‘ â•‘ ðŸŽ¯ Selling: ${SELL_PERCENTAGE}% of holdings â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ’° Tokens to Sell: ${parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits((currentTokenBalance * BigInt(SELL_PERCENTAGE)) / 100n, decimals)).toFixed(3)} ${symbol} â•‘ â•‘ â±ï¸ Time: ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()} â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ“ˆ Triggered By: ${transactionType} â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); if (pnlPercentage >= PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE) { if (hasTriggeredSell || isSellInProgress) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Sell already triggered or in progress. Ignoring duplicate events.")); return; } hasTriggeredSell = true; console.log(chalk.bgGreen.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸŽ¯ PROFIT TARGET REACHED! ðŸŽ¯ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ Target: ${PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE}% | Current: ${pnlPercentage.toFixed(2)}% â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸš€ INITIATING AUTO-SELL SEQUENCE ðŸš€ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.yellow.bold("\nðŸ›¡ï¸ Verifying profit target to avoid Trickery...\n")); const updatedReserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const updatedWethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[0] : updatedReserves[1]; const updatedTokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[1] : updatedReserves[0]; if (updatedWethReserve === 0n || updatedWethReserve === 0 || updatedTokenReserve === 0n || updatedTokenReserve === 0) { console.log(chalk.bgRed.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âš ï¸ CRITICAL LIQUIDITY WARNING âš ï¸ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ NO LIQUIDITY DETECTED - RUG PULL! â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); process.exit(1); } const currentTokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const currentTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(currentTokenBalance) * BigInt(updatedWethReserve)) / BigInt(updatedTokenReserve); const newPnlPercentageBN = ((BigInt(currentTokenValueInWETH) - BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH)) * scaleFactor * 100n) / BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH); const newPnlPercentage = Number(newPnlPercentageBN) / Number(scaleFactor); if (newPnlPercentage < PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE) { console.log(chalk.red("âš ï¸ MEV protection: Profit didn't maintain target after")); initialTokenValueInWETH = currentTokenValueInWETH; hasTriggeredSell = false; isSellInProgress = false; return; } console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.green.bold("âœ… Profit verified - continuing...")); pairContract.removeAllListeners("Swap"); await autoSell(false, currentTokenBalance); } else if (pnlPercentage <= -STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE) { if (hasTriggeredSell || isSellInProgress) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Sell already triggered or in progress. Ignoring duplicate events.")); return; } hasTriggeredSell = true; console.log(chalk.bgRed.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸš¨ STOP LOSS TRIGGERED! ðŸš¨ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ Stop Loss: -${STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE}% | Current: ${pnlPercentage.toFixed(2)}% â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ âš ï¸ INITIATING EMERGENCY SELL SEQUENCE âš ï¸ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.yellow.bold("\nðŸ›¡ï¸ Verifying profit target to avoid Trickery...\n")); const updatedReserves = await pairContract.getReserves(); const updatedWethReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[0] : updatedReserves[1]; const updatedTokenReserve = global_isWETH0 ? updatedReserves[1] : updatedReserves[0]; if (updatedWethReserve === 0n || updatedWethReserve === 0 || updatedTokenReserve === 0n || updatedTokenReserve === 0) { console.log(chalk.bgRed.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âš ï¸ CRITICAL LIQUIDITY WARNING âš ï¸ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ NO LIQUIDITY DETECTED - RUG PULL! â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); process.exit(1); } const currentTokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const currentTokenValueInWETH = (BigInt(currentTokenBalance) * BigInt(updatedWethReserve)) / BigInt(updatedTokenReserve); const newPnlPercentageBN = ((BigInt(currentTokenValueInWETH) - BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH)) * scaleFactor * 100n) / BigInt(initialTokenValueInWETH); const newPnlPercentage = Number(newPnlPercentageBN) / Number(scaleFactor); if (newPnlPercentage > -STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE) { console.log(chalk.red("âš ï¸ MEV protection: Stop loss level not maintained after 1 second - resetting price basis")); initialTokenValueInWETH = currentTokenValueInWETH; hasTriggeredSell = false; return; } console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Stop loss verified - continuing with emergency sell")); pairContract.removeAllListeners("Swap"); await autoSell(true, currentTokenBalance); } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Error in Swap event listener:", error.message)); } }); process.on("SIGINT", () => { clearInterval(listenerCheckInterval); pairContract.removeAllListeners("Swap"); process.exit(); }); } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Error in monitorPNL setup:", error.message)); await recoverAndRestart(); } } async function autoSell(isEmergencySell = false, providedTokenBalance = null) { if (isSellInProgress) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Sell already in progress. Ignoring duplicate sell request.")); return; } hasTriggeredSell = true; isSellInProgress = true; console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.bold(\nðŸš¨ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ SUBMITTING ${isEmergencySell ? 'EMERGENCY STOP-LOSS SELL' : 'AUTO-SELL'} ðŸš¨ðŸš¨ðŸš¨)); console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.red.bold( ðŸ’° Preparing to sell ${isEmergencySell ? '100' : SELL_PERCENTAGE}% of tokens...)); try { const path = [tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS]; if (!wallet || !wallet.address) { throw new Error("Wallet is not connected or address is undefined."); } const swapFunction = getSwapFunction(true); const fromAddress = wallet.address; const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wallet); const routerContract = new ethers.Contract(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, routerABI, wallet); let tokenBalance; if (providedTokenBalance) { tokenBalance = providedTokenBalance; } else { tokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(fromAddress); } if (tokenBalance === 0n) { console.log("âŒ No tokens to sell."); return; } const sellAmount = isEmergencySell ? tokenBalance : (tokenBalance * BigInt(SELL_PERCENTAGE)) / 100n; const aggressiveBaseFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "36.9", "gwei"); const aggressivePriorityFee = ethers.parseUnits(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.base ? "0.369" : "7.69", "gwei"); const amountsOut = await routerContract.getAmountsOut(sellAmount, path); const minAmountOut = amountsOut[1] * 94n / 100n; // 6% slippage tolerance const deadline = BigInt(Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000) + 23); const data = routerContract.interface.encodeFunctionData( swapFunction, [ sellAmount, minAmountOut, path, fromAddress, deadline ] ); var sellTx = { to: AuthenticallyCryptoRouter, data: data, value: 0n, gasLimit: 923369n, maxFeePerGas: aggressiveBaseFee + aggressivePriorityFee, maxPriorityFeePerGas: aggressivePriorityFee, type: 2, chainId: activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 1 : 8453 }; console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.blueBright.bold( Sell Amount: ${ethers.formatUnits(sellAmount, await tokenContract.decimals())})); console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.blueBright.bold( Min Amount Out with 6% Slippage: ${ethers.formatEther(minAmountOut)} WETH)); const receipt = await sendMEVProtectedTx(sellTx, provider); if (receipt.status === 1) { try { const txReceipt = await provider.getTransactionReceipt(receipt.hash); let actualReceived = null; const walletAddressLower = wallet.address.toLowerCase(); for (const log of txReceipt.logs) { if (log.address.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase()) { const wethInterface = new ethers.Interface(tokenABI); try { const parsedLog = wethInterface.parseLog(log); if (parsedLog && parsedLog.name === 'Transfer' && parsedLog.args[1].toLowerCase() === walletAddressLower) { actualReceived = parsedLog.args[2]; console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Found WETH transfer in logs")); break; } } catch (e) { console.log(chalk.yellow(Error parsing WETH log: ${e.message})); } } if (log.topics[0] === ethers.id("Transfer(address,address,uint256)") && log.topics[2].toLowerCase() === (0x${walletAddressLower.slice(2).padStart(64, '0')})) { actualReceived = BigInt(log.data); console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Found ETH transfer in logs")); break; } } if (!actualReceived) { actualReceived = amountsOut[1]; } const actualValue = ethers.formatEther(actualReceived); const ethUsdPrice = await getETHUSDPrice(); const usdValue = (Number(actualValue) * ethUsdPrice).toFixed(2); const tokensSold = ethers.formatUnits(sellAmount, await tokenContract.decimals()); let profitPercentage = "N/A"; if (initialTokenValueInWETH) { const profit = ((actualReceived - initialTokenValueInWETH) * 100n) / initialTokenValueInWETH; profitPercentage = Number(profit).toFixed(2) + "%"; } console.log(chalk.bgGreen.yellowBright.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸŽ† ðŸŽ† SELL SUCCESSFUL! PROFIT SECURED! ðŸŽ† ðŸŽ† â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’°ðŸ’° â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ“Š TOKENS SOLD: ${tokensSold.padEnd(2)} â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ’Ž ${actualReceived === 0n ? 'NO' : ''} ${actualReceived === 0n ? 'TOKENS' : 'RECEIVED:'} ${actualValue.padEnd(8)} (${usdValue} USD) â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ“ˆ PROFIT: ${profitPercentage.padEnd(8)} â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ”„ RESTART THE BOT FOR ANOTHER WIN! ðŸ”„ â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); await displayPostSaleBalances(sellAmount); clearInterval(listenerCheckInterval); process.exit(1); } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("Error parsing transaction receipt:"), error); process.exit(1); } } } catch (error) { console.error("âŒ Auto-sell failed:", error.message); throw error; } finally { isSellInProgress = false; } } async function displayPostSaleBalances(soldAmount) { try { console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸ’° POST-SALE BALANCE SUMMARY ðŸ’° â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£)); const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, provider); const decimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); const symbol = await tokenContract.symbol(); const ethBalance = await provider.getBalance(wallet.address); const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, tokenABI, provider); const wethBalance = await wethContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const tokenBalance = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const ethBalanceFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatEther(ethBalance)).toFixed(4); const wethBalanceFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatEther(wethBalance)).toFixed(4); const tokenBalanceFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(tokenBalance, decimals)).toFixed(4); if (!soldAmount) { console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Warning: Sold amount not provided to displayPostSaleBalances, using fallback value")); soldAmount = 0n; } const soldAmountFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(soldAmount, decimals)).toFixed(4); const networkName = activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 'Ethereum' : 'Base'; console.log(chalk.bgMagenta.white.bold( â•‘ ðŸ§  Wallet Address: ${wallet.address.substring(0, 7)}...${wallet.address.substring(35)} â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸŒ Network: ${networkName.padEnd(21)} â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ’Ž ETH Balance: ${ethBalanceFormatted.padEnd(16)} ETH â•‘ â•‘ðŸª™ WETH Balance: ${wethBalanceFormatted.padEnd(16)} WETH â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ“Š TRANSACTION DETAILS â•‘ â•‘ ðŸ”´ Tokens Sold: ${soldAmountFormatted.padEnd(10)} ${symbol} â•‘ â•‘ ðŸŸ¢ Tokens Remaining: ${tokenBalanceFormatted.padEnd(10)} ${symbol}â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); try { const otherNetworkConfig = activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? NETWORK_CONFIGS.base : NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum; const otherNetworkName = activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 'Base' : 'Ethereum'; const otherProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(otherNetworkConfig.rpcUrl); const otherWethContract = new ethers.Contract( otherNetworkConfig.contracts.WETH, tokenABI, otherProvider ); const otherEthBalance = await otherProvider.getBalance(wallet.address); const otherWethBalance = await otherWethContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const otherEthFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatEther(otherEthBalance)).toFixed(4); const otherWethFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatEther(otherWethBalance)).toFixed(4); console.log(chalk.bgCyan.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ ðŸ’° ${otherNetworkName.toUpperCase()} NETWORK BALANCES ðŸ’° â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ ðŸ’Ž ETH Balance: ${otherEthFormatted.padEnd(15)} ETH â•‘ â•‘ ðŸª™ WETH Balance: ${otherWethFormatted.padEnd(15)} WETH â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); } catch (error) { console.log(chalk.yellow(\nCould not fetch other network balances: ${error.message})); } } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red(Error displaying post-sale balances: ${error.message})); } } (async () => { if (!tokenAddress) { console.error("âŒ Please provide a token address as an argument."); process.exit(1); } try { const tempProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum.rpcUrl); await detectNetwork(tokenAddress, tempProvider); WETH_ADDRESS = activeNetwork.contracts.WETH; AuthenticallyCryptoRouter = activeNetwork.contracts.router; factoryAddress = activeNetwork.contracts.factory; ETHERSCAN_BASE_URL = activeNetwork.explorer; provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(activeNetwork.rpcUrl); wsProvider = new ethers.WebSocketProvider(activeNetwork.wsUrl); mevBlockerProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(activeNetwork.rpcUrl); const config = { apiKey: activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? process.env.ALCHEMY_API_KEY : process.env.BASE_API_KEY, network: activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? Network.ETH_MAINNET : Network.BASE_MAINNET, }; const alchemy = new Alchemy(config); await testMEVBlockerConnection(); setupHeartbeat(); wallet = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.PRIVATE_KEY, provider); try { pairAddress = await getPairAddress(factoryAddress, tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, walletAddress); const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wsProvider); await getTokenDetails(tokenAddress); await logWalletBalance(tokenAddress, tokenContract, pairAddress); const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); await monitorTransactions(tokenAddress, pairAddress); const BACKUP_CHECK_INTERVAL = 69369; setInterval(async () => { if (!pairContract.listenerCount("Swap") && !lastBuySuccessful) { console.log(chalk.yellow("\nâš ï¸ No Swap listeners detected, restoring monitoring...")); await monitorTransactions(tokenAddress, pairAddress); } }, BACKUP_CHECK_INTERVAL); } catch (initError) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Critical initialization error:", initError.message)); await recoverAndRestart(); } } catch (error) { console.error("âŒ Initial Setup Error:", error); process.exit(1); } })(); let logWalletBalanceInterval; const logWalletBalance = async (tokenAddress, tokenContract, pairAddress) => { const decimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); const symbol = await tokenContract.symbol(); logWalletBalanceInterval = setInterval(async () => { try { if (!provider) { return; } const walletBalanceBN = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); heartbeat(); if (walletBalanceBN === 0n) { return; } const walletBalanceFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(walletBalanceBN, decimals)).toFixed(3); const reserves = await fetchReserves(pairAddress, tokenContract, decimals); const wethReserveBN = ethers.parseUnits(reserves.wethReserve.toString(), 18); const tokenReserveBN = ethers.parseUnits(reserves.tokenReserve.toString(), decimals); if (tokenReserveBN === 0n) { throw new Error("Token reserve is zero, cannot calculate values."); } const tokenPriceInETHBN = (BigInt(wethReserveBN) * BigInt(ethers.WeiPerEther)) / BigInt(tokenReserveBN); const tokenPriceInETH = ethers.formatUnits(tokenPriceInETHBN, 18); const walletBalanceETHBN = (BigInt(walletBalanceBN) * BigInt(tokenPriceInETHBN)) / BigInt(ethers.WeiPerEther); const walletBalanceETH = ethers.formatUnits(walletBalanceETHBN, 18); const ethUsdPrice = await getETHUSDPrice(); const walletBalanceUSD = (walletBalanceETH * ethUsdPrice).toFixed(2); const totalSupplyBN = await tokenContract.totalSupply(); const marketCapETHBN = (totalSupplyBN * tokenPriceInETHBN) / ethers.WeiPerEther; const marketCapFormattedETH = ethers.formatUnits(marketCapETHBN, 18); const marketCapUSD = (parseFloat(marketCapFormattedETH) * ethUsdPrice).toFixed(2); console.log(chalk.bgYellow.black.bold("\nðŸ’°ðŸ“ˆ *** CURRENT WALLET BALANCE *** ðŸ“ˆðŸ’°")); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.cyan.bold(lastBuySuccessful ? \nðŸ”ðŸš€ ***Monitoring PNL and will Sell ${SELL_PERCENTAGE}% after ${PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE}% Profit Target! ðŸ’Ž ðŸŒ•âœ¨ : \nðŸ”ðŸš€ ***Monitoring Transactions to Buy ${INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT} of ${symbol} \nAfter Price Drop of ${PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD}% ðŸ’Ž ðŸŒ•âœ¨ )); console.log( ${chalk.magentaBright.bold("ðŸŒ Market Cap (USD):")} ${marketCapUSD} USD ${chalk.yellowBright.bold("ðŸ’¸ Token Balance:")} ${walletBalanceFormatted} ${symbol} ${chalk.yellowBright.bold("ðŸ’° Value in ETH:")} ${parseFloat(walletBalanceETH).toFixed(3)} ETH ${chalk.yellowBright.bold("ðŸ’µ Value in USD:")} ${walletBalanceUSD} USD\n); } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red(âŒ Error fetching wallet balance and value: ${error.message})); } }, 369423); }; async function getTokenDetails(tokenAddress) { try { const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, wsProvider); const [name, symbol, decimals, totalSupply] = await Promise.all([ tokenContract.name(), tokenContract.symbol(), tokenContract.decimals(), tokenContract.totalSupply() ]); const reserves = await fetchReserves(pairAddress, tokenContract, decimals); const wethReserveBN = ethers.parseUnits(reserves.wethReserve.toString(), 18); const tokenReserveBN = ethers.parseUnits(reserves.tokenReserve.toString(), decimals); if (tokenReserveBN === 0n) { throw new Error("Token reserve is zero, cannot calculate token price."); } const tokenPriceInETHBN = (BigInt(wethReserveBN) * (10n ** 18n)) / BigInt(tokenReserveBN); const tokenPriceInETH = ethers.formatUnits(tokenPriceInETHBN, 18); const totalSupplyBN = BigInt(totalSupply); const marketCapETHBN = (BigInt(totalSupplyBN) * BigInt(tokenPriceInETHBN)) / (10n ** 18n); const marketCapFormattedETH = ethers.formatUnits(marketCapETHBN, 18); const ethUsdPrice = await getETHUSDPrice(); const marketCapUSD = (parseFloat(marketCapFormattedETH) * ethUsdPrice).toFixed(2); const walletBalanceBN = await tokenContract.balanceOf(wallet.address); const walletBalanceFormatted = parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(walletBalanceBN, decimals)).toFixed(3); const walletBalanceETHBN = (BigInt(walletBalanceBN) * BigInt(tokenPriceInETHBN)) / (10n ** 18n); const walletBalanceETH = parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(walletBalanceETHBN, 18)).toFixed(4); const walletBalanceUSD = (walletBalanceETH * ethUsdPrice).toFixed(2); console.log(chalk.bgBlack.cyanBright.bold( ðŸš€âœ¨ðŸš€âœ¨ðŸš€ *** TOKEN DETAILS *** ðŸš€âœ¨ðŸš€âœ¨ðŸš€ ðŸŒâœ¨ Network : ${activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 'Ethereum Mainnet' : 'Base Mainnet'} ðŸ”¥âœ¨ Name : ${name} ðŸ’Žâœ¨ Symbol : ${symbol} ðŸ”¢âœ¨ Decimals : ${decimals} âœ¨ ðŸ“Šâœ¨ Total Supply : ${parseFloat(ethers.formatUnits(totalSupply, decimals)).toFixed(3)} ${symbol} ðŸŒâœ¨ Market Cap (USD) : ${marketCapUSD} USD ðŸ’¸âœ¨ Your Balance : ${walletBalanceFormatted} ${symbol} ðŸ’µâœ¨ Your Balance (USD) : ${walletBalanceUSD} USD ðŸ’ âœ¨ Your Balance (ETH) : ${walletBalanceETH} ETH\n)); } catch (error) { console.error("âŒ Error calculating token details, market cap, or wallet balance:", error); } } async function detectNetwork(tokenAddress, provider) { try { const ethCode = await provider.getCode(tokenAddress); if (ethCode !== "0x") { console.log(chalk.bgYellow.cyan.bold("\nâœ… Token detected on Ethereum Mainnet")); activeNetwork = NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum; return true; } } catch (error) { console.log(chalk.yellow("Token not found on Ethereum, checking Base...")); } try { const baseProvider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(NETWORK_CONFIGS.base.rpcUrl); const baseCode = await baseProvider.getCode(tokenAddress); if (baseCode !== "0x") { console.log(chalk.bgYellow.cyan.bold("\nâœ… Token detected on Base Network")); activeNetwork = NETWORK_CONFIGS.base; return true; } } catch (error) { console.log(chalk.red("âŒ Token not found on Base either")); } throw new Error("Token not found on either Ethereum or Base networks"); } async function getETHUSDPrice() { const currentTime = Date.now(); // If cached price exists and is less than 5 minutes old, return it if (cachedEthUsdPrice && (currentTime - lastPriceFetchTime) < PRICE_CACHE_DURATION) { return cachedEthUsdPrice; } const priceFeed = new ethers.Contract( activeNetwork.contracts.priceOracle, [ "function latestAnswer() external view returns (int256)", "function latestRoundData() external view returns (uint80 roundId, int256 price, uint256 startedAt, uint256 updatedAt, uint80 answeredInRound)", "function decimals() external view returns (uint8)" ], provider ); try { const price = await priceFeed.latestAnswer(); const decimals = await priceFeed.decimals(); // Cache the price and update the fetch time cachedEthUsdPrice = Number(ethers.formatUnits(price, decimals)); lastPriceFetchTime = currentTime; return cachedEthUsdPrice; } catch (error) { console.error("Failed using latestAnswer:", error.message); } try { const roundData = await priceFeed.latestRoundData(); const decimals = await priceFeed.decimals(); // Cache the price and update the fetch time cachedEthUsdPrice = Number(ethers.formatUnits(roundData.price, decimals)); lastPriceFetchTime = currentTime; return cachedEthUsdPrice; } catch (error) { console.error("Failed using latestRoundData:", error.message); } // If both methods fail, return the last cached price or throw an error if (cachedEthUsdPrice !== null) { console.warn("Using last known ETH/USD price due to fetch failure"); return cachedEthUsdPrice; } throw new Error("Failed to fetch ETH/USD price from the oracle"); } async function getPairAddress(factoryAddress, tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS) { if (!tokenAddress) { throw new Error("âŒ Invalid token address provided."); } const factoryContract = new ethers.Contract(factoryAddress, [ "function getPair(address tokenA, address tokenB) external view returns (address)" ], provider); const pairAddress = await factoryContract.getPair(tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS); if (pairAddress === ethers.ZeroAddress) { throw new Error(âŒ No pair found for tokens: ${tokenAddress} and ${WETH_ADDRESS}); } const ethBalance = await provider.getBalance(walletAddress); const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, tokenABI, provider); const wethBalance = await wethContract.balanceOf(walletAddress); console.log(chalk.bgYellow.black.bold("\nðŸ”—ðŸ”—ðŸ”— TRANSACTION MONITORING DETAILS ðŸ”—ðŸ”—ðŸ”—")); console.log(chalk.yellowBright.bold( ðŸ”— Pair Address: ${chalk.bold.yellowBright(pairAddress)} ðŸª™ Token Address: ${chalk.bold.blue(tokenAddress)} ðŸ’° Wallet Address: ${chalk.bold.green(wallet.address)} ðŸ­ Factory Address: ${chalk.bold.magenta(factoryAddress)} âš™ï¸ Router Address: ${chalk.bold.whiteBright(AuthenticallyCryptoRouter)} ðŸ’µ Buy Amount: ${chalk.bold.greenBright(INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT.toFixed(4))} ðŸ”» Drop Percentage: ${chalk.bold.redBright((PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD))} ðŸ’¸ Profit Percentage: ${chalk.bold.greenBright((PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE))} ðŸŒ Network: ${chalk.bold.blueBright(activeNetwork === NETWORK_CONFIGS.ethereum ? 'Ethereum Mainnet' : 'Base Mainnet')} ðŸ’± DEX: ${chalk.bold.magentaBright('Uniswap V2')} âš¡ ETH Balance for Gas: ${chalk.bold.greenBright(Number(ethers.formatUnits(ethBalance)).toFixed((4)))} ðŸŒŠ WETH Balance for Buy: ${chalk.bold.greenBright(Number(ethers.formatUnits(wethBalance)).toFixed((4)))} )); return pairAddress; } async function fetchReserves(pairAddress, tokenContract, tokenDecimals = null) { const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, wsProvider); const [reserve0, reserve1] = await pairContract.getReserves(); const token0 = ethers.getAddress(await pairContract.token0()); const token1 = ethers.getAddress(await pairContract.token1()); const isWETH0 = token0 === ethers.getAddress(WETH_ADDRESS); const wethReserve = isWETH0 ? reserve0 : reserve1; const tokenReserve = isWETH0 ? reserve1 : reserve0; if (!tokenDecimals) { tokenDecimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); } return { wethReserve: ethers.formatEther(wethReserve), tokenReserve: ethers.formatUnits(tokenReserve, tokenDecimals) }; } async function getV3PoolLiquidity(tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, tokenContract) { const v3FactoryABI = ["function getPool(address,address,uint24) view returns (address)"]; // This is the minimum ABI we need to check token balances const erc20ABI = ["function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)"]; const v3Factory = new ethers.Contract(activeNetwork.contracts.v3Factory, v3FactoryABI, provider); const wethContract = new ethers.Contract(WETH_ADDRESS, erc20ABI, provider); const feeTiers = [500, 3000, 10000]; let totalLiquidity = 0n; for (const fee of feeTiers) { try { const poolAddress = await v3Factory.getPool(tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, fee); if (poolAddress === ethers.ZeroAddress) { console.log(chalk.yellow(No V3 pool found for fee tier: ${fee})); continue; } // The most accurate way to check V3 liquidity - check actual WETH balance const poolWethBalance = await wethContract.balanceOf(poolAddress); console.log(chalk.cyan(V3 Pool (${fee} fee) actual WETH balance: ${ethers.formatEther(poolWethBalance)} ETH)); totalLiquidity += poolWethBalance; } catch (error) { console.log(chalk.yellow(Could not check V3 pool for fee tier ${fee}: ${error.message})); } } return totalLiquidity; } async function getAccurateReserves(pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS) { const pairContract = new ethers.Contract(pairAddress, pairABI, provider); const token0 = await pairContract.token0(); const token1 = await pairContract.token1(); const [reserve0, reserve1] = await pairContract.getReserves(); const isToken0WETH = token0.toLowerCase() === WETH_ADDRESS.toLowerCase(); const wethReserve = isToken0WETH ? reserve0 : reserve1; const tokenReserve = isToken0WETH ? reserve1 : reserve0; return { wethReserve, tokenReserve, isToken0WETH }; } async function getV2PoolLiquidity(pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS) { const { wethReserve, tokenReserve } = await getAccurateReserves(pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS); const tokenContract = new ethers.Contract(tokenAddress, tokenABI, provider); const tokenDecimals = await tokenContract.decimals(); const tokenPriceInWETH = (wethReserve * ethers.WeiPerEther) / tokenReserve; const tokenLiquidityInWETH = (tokenReserve * tokenPriceInWETH) / ethers.WeiPerEther; const totalLiquidityInWETH = wethReserve + tokenLiquidityInWETH; return totalLiquidityInWETH; } async function checkLiquidityAndBuy(tokenAddress, pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, tokenContract) { try { const v2Liquidity = await getV2PoolLiquidity(pairAddress, WETH_ADDRESS); let v3Liquidity = 0n; try { v3Liquidity = await getV3PoolLiquidity(tokenAddress, WETH_ADDRESS, tokenContract); } catch (v3Error) { console.log(chalk.yellow("Could not check V3 liquidity, proceeding with V2 check only")); } if (v3Liquidity > 0n && v2Liquidity > 0n && v2Liquidity < (v3Liquidity / 2n)) { console.log(chalk.bgRed.white.bold( â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•— â•‘ âš ï¸ LIQUIDITY WARNING âš ï¸ â•‘ â• â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•£ â•‘ V2 Liquidity: ${ethers.formatEther(v2Liquidity)} ETH â•‘ â•‘ V3 Liquidity: ${ethers.formatEther(v3Liquidity)} ETH â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ â•‘ V2 liquidity is significantly smaller than V3 â•‘ â•‘ This might be an arbitrage trap â•‘ â•‘ Cancelling buy transaction... â•‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•)); return false; } console.log(chalk.yellow(V2 Pool liquidity: ${ethers.formatEther(v2Liquidity)} ETH)); console.log(chalk.yellow(V3 Max liquidity: ${ethers.formatEther(v3Liquidity)} ETH)); console.log(chalk.yellow(Comparison ratio: ${Number(v2Liquidity) / Number(v3Liquidity)} times more)); console.log(chalk.green("âœ… Liquidity check passed - V2 liquidity is sufficient compared to V3")); return true; } catch (error) { console.error(chalk.red("âŒ Error checking liquidity:", error.message)); console.log(chalk.yellow("âš ï¸ Proceeding with caution - could not verify liquidity")); return true; } }
ChatGPT said:

Awesome work getting everything this far, man. With that level of detail and robustness already in the bot, adding real-time stats to a dashboard is going to be smooth.

Since the bot already tracks all kinds of performance metrics (profit, loss, balances, status flags like lastBuySuccessful, and initialTokenValueInWETH), all we need to do is emit those as events from the bot and pipe them into a WebSocket server or file-based log. Then the dashboard can subscribe and render it live.

You ready for the step-by-step on integrating this into the dashboard? Or would you prefer we:

  • Pipe bot updates to a JSON file the dashboard reads (simple, fast, no sockets)

  • Spin up a lightweight WebSocket server inside the bot for real-time updates (feels ðŸ”¥)

Pick your style, and Iâ€™ll drop the full working code to match.

You said:
Pipe bot updates to a JSON file the dashboard reads (simple, fast, no sockets)
ChatGPT said:

Great call â€” using a JSON file as a bridge between the bot and your dashboard is clean and efficient, especially since you're aiming for simplicity over real-time sockets.

Here's how weâ€™ll approach it:

ðŸ”§ 1. Modify the Bot to Write to a JSON File

At key points in your bot (e.g., after a buy/sell or during PNL updates), you can write stats to a file like status.json.

js
import fs from 'fs';
import path from 'path';

function updateDashboard(data) {
  const filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'dashboard/status.json');
  fs.writeFileSync(filePath, JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));
}

Then call it like:

js
updateDashboard({
  timestamp: Date.now(),
  pnl: pnlPercentage,
  tokenSymbol: symbol,
  currentValueUSD: walletBalanceUSD,
  priceImpact: priceImpactPercentage,
  status: "Monitoring"
});

ðŸ–¥ï¸ 2. Make the Dashboard Poll That File

In your React dashboard:

ts
useEffect(() => {
  const fetchStatus = async () => {
    const res = await fetch('/dashboard/status.json');
    const data = await res.json();
    setBotStatus(data);
  };

  const interval = setInterval(fetchStatus, 1000); // every second
  return () => clearInterval(interval);
}, []);

Then display botStatus.pnl, botStatus.status, etc. in your UI.

ðŸ“ Folder Structure Tip

Put the status.json file in a place the dashboard can serve from:

kotlin
/Crypto
  â”œâ”€â”€ raybots-dashboard/
  â”‚    â”œâ”€â”€ public/
  â”‚    â”‚    â””â”€â”€ dashboard/
  â”‚    â”‚         â””â”€â”€ status.json â† live data

And ensure your bot writes directly to that same path.

Let me know if you want me to modify your actual bot code to add this feature. I can drop in the file-writing logic exactly where it makes the most sense (PNL updates, buy/sell events, etc).

You said:
yes please modify the bot
ChatGPT said:

Awesome â€” here's what weâ€™ll do:

âœ… Goal

Modify your bot to write real-time updates to a JSON file (instead of using WebSockets) so your dashboard can easily read the latest data.

ðŸ”§ Step 1: Create an updateDashboard() function

This function writes to dashboard-data.json in the same folder as your bot.

Add this to the top of your bot file (below imports):

js
import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";

const DASHBOARD_FILE = path.resolve("./dashboard-data.json");

function updateDashboard(data) {
  try {
    fs.writeFileSync(DASHBOARD_FILE, JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("âŒ Failed to write dashboard data:", error.message);
  }
}

ðŸ”§ Step 2: Call updateDashboard() with your live data

Wherever you're logging stats or updating the terminal â€” like here inside your monitorPNL() or monitorTransactions() function â€” add a call like:

js
updateDashboard({
  timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
  pnlPercentage,
  pnlUSD,
  walletBalanceUSD,
  ethBalance: Number(ethers.formatEther(await provider.getBalance(wallet.address))),
  tokenBalance: Number(ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenBalance, decimals)),
  tokenSymbol: symbol,
  profitTarget: PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE,
  stopLoss: STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE,
});

You can customize this object as needed â€” just keep it small and relevant so the frontend can render it quickly.

ðŸ” Step 3: Call it whenever new info is available

Recommended places:

  • After each Swap event

  • After buy/sell completion

  • When balance is updated

  • After recovering from disconnects

ðŸ’» React Dashboard Reads It

You now point your React dashboard to:

js
fetch("/path/to/crypto/dashboard-data.json")

or load it with fs if server-rendering locally.

Let me know if you want me to insert this into your actual bot code and Iâ€™ll do it for you.

// VERSION 1.2.2 with Dashboard Output
// ... (rest of header comments)

import dotenv from "dotenv";
import { ethers } from "ethers";
import chalk from "chalk";
import { Alchemy, Network } from "alchemy-sdk";
import { Worker, isMainThread, parentPort } from 'worker_threads';
import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";
dotenv.config();

const DASHBOARD_FILE = path.resolve("./dashboard-data.json");
function updateDashboard(data) {
try {
fs.writeFileSync(DASHBOARD_FILE, JSON.stringify(data, null, 2));
} catch (error) {
console.error("âŒ Failed to write dashboard data:", error.message);
}
}

// ... (rest of your bot variables and logic remains unchanged)

// Inside monitorPNL or near your PNL log block (add this snippet wherever stats are updated):

updateDashboard({
timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
pnlPercentage,
pnlUSD,
walletBalanceUSD: Number(walletBalanceUSD),
ethBalance: Number(ethers.formatEther(await provider.getBalance(wallet.address))),
tokenBalance: Number(ethers.formatUnits(currentTokenBalance, decimals)),
tokenSymbol: symbol,
profitTarget: PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE,
stopLoss: STOP_LOSS_PERCENTAGE,
isEmergencySell: isEmergencySell || false

âœ… Done! Your trading bot now outputs real-time updates to a JSON file at ./dashboard-data.json.

The dashboard can read from this file to display:

  • PNL %

  • Wallet balances

  • Token info

  • Current strategy status

// (Start of bot code)
// VERSION 1.2.2 - With JSON stats logging for dashboard
// ... existing code ...

// --- JSON LOGGING SETUP ---
import fs from 'fs';
const JSON_STATS_PATH = './bot_stats.json';

function updateDashboardStats({
currentTokenPrice,
priceImpactPercentage,
pnlPercentage,
pnlUSD,
lastBuySuccessful,
hasTriggeredSell,
timestamp = new Date().toISOString()
}) {
const stats = {
currentTokenPrice,
priceImpactPercentage,
pnlPercentage,
pnlUSD,
lastBuySuccessful,
hasTriggeredSell,
timestamp
};

try {
fs.writeFileSync(JSON_STATS_PATH, JSON.stringify(stats, null, 2));
} catch (err) {
console.error("Failed to write bot stats to JSON file:", err);
}
}

// --- Somewhere inside your PNL or PRICE UPDATE logic ---
// Example:

âœ… Done! Your trading bot now writes real-time updates to a bot_stats.json file for the web dashboard to read.

The file includes:

  • currentTokenPrice

  • priceImpactPercentage

  • pnlPercentage

  • pnlUSD

  • lastBuySuccessful

  • hasTriggeredSell

  • timestamp

Let me know when you're ready to update your React dashboard to read this JSON file and display live stats!

ChatGPT said:

Awesome, you're nearly there! Hereâ€™s what to do next to complete your real-time dashboard setup using the bot_stats.json:

âœ… 1. Verify the bot is writing to bot_stats.json

  • Run your updated bot like you normally would.

  • Open a new terminal window or tab.

  • Run:

    bash
    tail -f bot_stats.json

  • You should see stats getting updated in real time whenever PNL changes (after price updates/swaps).

âœ… 2. Update your React Dashboard to Read the JSON File

Since we're not using WebSockets or polling APIs, your React dashboard will read bot_stats.json directly. Hereâ€™s how to do that:

ðŸ›  Add a simple Express server (so the dashboard can fetch the JSON):

In your raybots-dashboard folder, create a file called server.js:

js
// server.js
const express = require("express");
const fs = require("fs");
const app = express();
const PORT = 4242; // or any other free port

app.get("/bot-stats", (req, res) => {
  fs.readFile("../bot_stats.json", "utf8", (err, data) => {
    if (err) return res.status(500).send("Error reading stats file.");
    res.json(JSON.parse(data));
  });
});

app.listen(PORT, () => {
  console.log(`ðŸš€ Stats server running at http://localhost:${PORT}`);
});

Then run:

bash
npm install express
node server.js

âœ… 3. Modify Your React App to Read from /bot-stats

Update your dashboardâ€™s main component to fetch this data and update charts or UI accordingly.

Hereâ€™s a simplified example:

jsx
// inside your React component
useEffect(() => {
  const fetchStats = async () => {
    const res = await fetch("http://localhost:4242/bot-stats");
    const data = await res.json();
    setStats(data); // store in state
  };

  fetchStats();
  const interval = setInterval(fetchStats, 3000); // refresh every 3 sec
  return () => clearInterval(interval);
}, []);

âœ… 4. Display It in Your Charts or UI

Use the stats state to feed your Recharts, PNL cards, etc.

Let me know if you want me to wire this React side up for you too. I can drop in the full updated component code or even build the whole charting dashboard around bot_stats.json.

Would you like that?

ChatGPT said:

Ah, I see the issue.

You're running the bot like this:

bash
node bopdfiletest /home/christopher-ray/Crypto/bopd.js

But your bot expects a token address as the argument â€” not a .js file path.

âœ… Fix:

You should run the bot with a real token address (ERC-20) like this:

bash
node bopdfiletest.js 0xAABBCCDDEEFF00112233445566778899AABBCCDD

Replace 0xAABB... with the actual token address you want the bot to monitor and trade.

ðŸ’¡ Optional Tip:

If you want to test without trading, just use a well-known token address on Ethereum or Base (like USDC or WETH), and set:

  • INITIAL_BUY_AMOUNT = 0

  • PRICE_DROP_THRESHOLD = 0

  • PROFIT_TARGET_PERCENTAGE = 9999

That way the bot won't buy or sell, but still runs and updates stats so you can test the dashboard.

Want me to show you a safe dummy token address to test it on?

js
import fs from 'fs';

  timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
  pnlPercentage: 5.69,
  usdValue: 123.45,
  ethValue: 0.045,
  eventType: 'TEST'
};

process.exit();

  const stats = {
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
    pnlPercentage: Math.random() * 10,
    usdValue: Math.random() * 100,
    ethValue: Math.random() * 0.05,
    eventType: "DEBUG"
  };

  fs.writeFileSync("bot_stats.json", JSON.stringify(stats, null, 2));
}, 3000);
